summary: Documentary to mark the 150th anniversary of Alice's Adventures in Wonderland.
cast: Martha Kearney|Richard E. Grant|Philip Pullman|Will Self|Alice Liddell|Robert Douglas-Fairhurst|Edward Wakeling|Nicholas Shrimpton|Vanessa Tait|Morton N. Cohen|Jenny Woolf|Mark Davies|Caroline Luke|Hugh Haughton|Jane Atkinson|Peter Atkinson|Nicholas Burnett|David Anley|Ian Clayton|Peter Howell
title: The Secret World of Lewis Carroll
